snippet: Carlos Beltran was one of a few concerns for the Yankees after reliever Shawn Kelley was placed on the disabled list, joining C. C. Sabathia, Ivan Nova and Michael Pineda on the list of banged-up pitchers.
lead_paragraph: Carlos Beltran was one of a few concerns for the Yankees after reliever Shawn Kelley was placed on the disabled list, joining C. C. Sabathia, Ivan Nova and Michael Pineda on the list of banged-up pitchers.

headline.main: Sore Right Elbow Puts Beltran on a Long List of Injured Yankees
headline.print_headline: Sore Right Elbow Puts Beltran on a Long List of Injured Yankees
